meta.name: Al-Hilali & Khan
meta.translator_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali & Muhammad Muhsin Khan

verses: Say (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): "He is Allâh, (the) One.
"Allâh-us-Samad (السيد الذي يصمد إليه في الحاجات) [Allâh the Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, (He neither eats nor drinks)].
"He begets not, nor was He begotten.
"And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him."
